str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a derivative of mneme; to exercise memory, i.e. Recollect; by implication, to punish; also to rehearse.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) a way out, escape, (b) result, issue. From a compound of ek and the base of basis; an exit.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
To bend or turn back; I return. From ana and kampto; to turn back.
